io.vertx.ext.reactivestreams

Interface ReactiveWriteStream<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>, io.vertx.core.streams.StreamBase, io.vertx.core.streams.WriteStream<T>

    public interface ReactiveWriteStream<T>
extends io.vertx.core.streams.WriteStream<T>, org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>
    A Vert.x write stream that also implements reactive streams publisher interface.
    Author:
    Tim Fox
